lines.text: Microscopic property: Speed of an individual molecule

secText:
Lesson:
1. Define [OBJ:expsec_k461:thermodynamics]. Compare and contrast microscopic and macroscopic properties.
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_k462:thermal energy] and identify examples of thermal energy.
3. Calculate [OBJ:expsec_k466:thermal energy].
4. Define [OBJ:expsec_k464:temperature].
5. Determine how to measure [OBJ:expsec_k467:temperature].
